item.title: Republicans Announce Legislative Plans To Punish The Performance Of Child-Mutilating Transgender Surgeries
item.description: The Safeguarding The Overall Protection of Minors (STOP) Act would reportedly put heavy fines on doctors who perform transgender procedures on minors.

item.title: Nashville Reporter Only Sees Racism In Moving To A Christianity-Friendly Small Town
item.description: As Venezuelan gang soldiers set up shop in Tennessee, a Nashville reporter directs ire at a handful of American families who’ve moved in.

item.title: Biden Just Invited World War 3 By Greenlighting Long-Range Missiles Against Russia
item.description: 'It would substantially change the very essence, the nature of the conflict,' Putin warned in September.

item.title: In Its New ‘Copy Nothing’ Campaign, Jaguar Copies Bud Light
item.description: As the Democrats, Bud Light, and a host of other businesses have learned, people are tired of the crazy. But sure, Jaguar, copy nothing, except for fa...

item.title: To Restore Democracy Trump Will Have To Overcome Administrative State Tyranny
item.description: The second Trump administration was elected as the antidote to the administrative state — to make radical changes in personnel and policy.
